website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you want a basic tackle box, and it's not just for the novice or child, either.
pros: Well-made box with useful compartments and lift-out tray
Good selection of tools and tackle
It isn't just stuffed with hooks and split shot to make up the numbers
cons: Some of the tackle isn't great quality and will need to be replaced before long

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the fishing hook pliers that was supposed to be included with it, it was never included so if that’s the reason you are purchasing this save yourself some aggravation and just buy the pliers, otherwise the product is ok
customer_reviews.author: John J. Serra

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for child
customer_reviews.text: Lots of items for the price. Be careful of some of the sharper items when opening. My 7 year old grandson loves it!!! I did place a couple of additional items inside and gave it as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen May

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth Starter
customer_reviews.text: Nice tackle box with plenty of storage as a starter kit for pre-teens. However, the box latch is not 100% reliable. Always double check it’s secure before picking up by the handle. The color is true to the photo and my little man loved that it was green and black. The accessories are great; not top of the line but are holding strong. My boy isnt as careful as my girlie but the tackle box has held up great with his toughness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tackle box.
customer_reviews.text: I have been fishing for 73 yr's my grandson wanted to take up fishing this year I checked out the Wakeman single tray Tackle box on line placed my order and was surprised at all the rite items needed to set my grandson up to start fishing. If I would have gone to a sporting goods store and picked out the items I thought he would need I would of spent much Moore and would not of gotten some of the things you need. it has some things included that I don't have in my Tackle box. It's is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael f martin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say, I'm disappointed in the quality of this. My son was really excited about getting his first "real" tackle box and when we got this we left for the lake. The box itself is a decent size, but the quality is poorly made, and the handle has broken already. The lures and other accessories are just as bad. Pieces are missing or broken, the plastics are cheaply designed and put together. I would expect this from a less expensive product, but it didnt come from the dollar tree or five below.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Bryner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these tackle boxes - the only issue that I had was the prices changed depending on the color you chose. I'm not about to pay a few bucks extra for a tackle box that is going to get fish guts and blood all over it just so I can have pink. They are cute and really good for children to start off learning how to fish, prepare tackle and have a little gear. The price altering depending on color is a little ridiculous - since they all have the same items inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent size and I like the pop of color
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent size and I like the pop of color. It came with some basic, but handy, items. I'm not overly sensitive to smell, but it does smell really bad straight out of the package. I put it outside overnight and haven't checked on it since. For the price I paid ($11), I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small tackle box for young and old.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, great quality for the price. I bought it as a gift for my grandson and was nicely surprised for it's quality and sturdiness. For the type of fishing we do here in Missouri, I couldn't ask for more. Handy size, nice looking and feeling. I recommend it, am very pleased that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John Bebout

customer_reviews.title: Case it a little flimsy. Also the latches don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Case it a little flimsy. Also the latches don't snap all the way and stay. For the price I got this as a backup camping box, but this is not a daily use one. I just wish that they had put a little more effort into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Full of Stuff for Beginner But Top Doesn't Stay Shut
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little starter set for the price, but the plastic top does not stay shut. Every time we open the main compartment (green clip) the clear top pops open and everything falls out which is super annoying. Weak clips. Not a rugged box overall.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box with all of the basics included
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box with all of the basics included. Unfortunately, it was dropped once (from a 4 year old height) and the handle broke right off and the top cracked. Would have hoped for more durability but the contents inside are probably worth the price, so not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Gal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for a young child
customer_reviews.text: This would be a starter kit for a young child, 8 and younger. Box is cheap and items inside are very tiny. Was buying to replace a tackle box that was old and falling apart. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Need to add pliers to kit so not everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to add pliers to kit so not everything you need is included unless you want to add sinkers by hitting them with a rock
customer_reviews.author: Cyphr511

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he needed a starter tackle box to get back into fishing. He loved it. For the price, you can go wrong. He did have to find some lures that better aligned with what he was fishing for, but he likes this box.
customer_reviews.author: Espy

customer_reviews.title: Realize how much you are paying and set expectations accordingly
customer_reviews.text: For what we paid its fine. But it it flimsy, the latches dont work well, some of the tackle was broken, but its a great cheap starter set for your young one.
customer_reviews.author: jkrush

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it was made cheaply. I ordered this as a gift for my husband. The tackle inside is for lil kids. There are some things he will use tho. We will see how it holds up. I do like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great starter box
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter box for kids! I think the construction of the box will last longer than I thought
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kind of a weak case but lots of useful stuff and clear duct tape make the case perfect
customer_reviews.author: j wat

customer_reviews.title: Ok stoage bin with some good items,
customer_reviews.text: - The floater did not float and/or broke on when I added them to the line. The lures and hooks seem fine. Quality not the same on all items of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Spookyman

customer_reviews.title: Beginning fishermen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two sons first fishing gear. Has everything for a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Ford power

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have the tackle box but many extras some I have no idea what they are for. The more I learn about the art of fishing the more I come to appreciate this starter tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small, Light and Nicely stocked
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my nephew who is new to fishing. It is perfect! I wanted something small since we walks to his neighborhood pond. Lots of lures and supplies inside to get a kid started. He was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: LRsmith

customer_reviews.title: Get starter kit and way to teach our kids how to enjoy the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son for his birthday. Very efficient and organized tackle box. Get starter kit and way to teach our kids how to enjoy the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: dana arthur

customer_reviews.title: No goos
customer_reviews.text: Box works as long as you never get rained on. We went fishing and it was rained out. The box filled with water with in the first hour
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Got it for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for someone for Christmas. They use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a real good value
customer_reviews.text: Overall most of the items are pretty cheap. No needle nose pliers as the picture shows. as others have said, it takes some work to make sure it is latched closed. Overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: mick rings

customer_reviews.title: Variety!
customer_reviews.text: We loved all of the fishing tackle and had a great time fishing !
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these. It is a great value
customer_reviews.author: SCVeal

customer_reviews.title: All items in perfect working condition
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I even expected the fishing line to be cheap and it was, but I still give it a 5, because I got this item for the box and the additional items. All items in perfect working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Renecio

customer_reviews.title: not complete
customer_reviews.text: recieved my tackle box today and was slightly disappointed, i thought it came with pliers that was in the pictures, but i guess not
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The hooks in this tackle box are a joke
customer_reviews.text: The hooks in this tackle box are a joke, box is good for my boy's 1st tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sweet tackle box!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bix. Contents are on the super cheap side but that’s ok for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds just enough
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this tackle it’s great it good everything you will every need and the quick access top helps when I need to change weights fast or lower hook sizes with out opening everything
customer_reviews.author: Bnice6498

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it'd be, but it's nice and my husband n son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Llanos

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and purchased as Christmas gift for my grandson. Has not been used yet but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DrivingDiva

customer_reviews.title: Everything u need
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a kid and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: bhavanes

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good starter box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product some things came broke but nothing to important and also fish it came with some saying what everything was
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tackle box that I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tackle box that I have ever had. Definitely recommended for a starter kit or just for a good tackle box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money but not much of a variety in the lures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tackle Box arrived in perfect condition however, it came without the handle. Is there a way I can one?
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter fishing kit for my son. Comes with a lot of supplies, happy we chose this kit. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Canelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great as a birthday gift! It has everything that was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stuff inside is good for a beginner fisherman. However, the quality is awful! The latch doesn’t keep the lid down, rendering the tackle box itself totally useless. My daughter was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cassie paluskas

customer_reviews.title: Made in China smell is getting out of control
customer_reviews.text: Smells like a chemical plant. What is amazon doing to keep our families safe? Honestly it feels like 50% of items under $30 are complete garbage and smell toxic.
customer_reviews.author: williamsantana

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tackle box for a youngster
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner tackle box for a youngster, however, lake or regional specific lures may be a better bet for catching the fish you're targeting
customer_reviews.author: McGrath

product_meta.title: Wakeman Fishing Single Tray Tackle Box 55 Pc Tackle Kit
product_meta.description: This Tackle Box plus 55 piece Tackle Kit from Wakeman Outdoors is the perfect starter pack for your favorite angler! For a basic tackle box this one offers tremendous flexibility and storage space. It features a lid with roomy built in storage compartments for quick and easy access. The single tray inside offers another layer of storage and removes to give you access to the open space below. Young and old alike will find this easy to transport to the water. Count on being able to fit your tools, extra terminal tackle and much more in this fantastic tackle box from Wakeman Outdoors!
feature_bullets: EASY ORGANIZATION- The Wakeman Outdoors Tackle Box features a lid with built in storage compartment for quick and easy access to fishing gear. The single tray inside offers additional storage and removes from the box to give you access to the space below

EASY TO CARRY- Anglers of every age will find this easy to transport to the water. The multiple latches help to secure all contents inside the tackle box and the collapsible handle helps for effortless transport and storage.

ESSENTIALS INCLUDED- The kit comes with standard, snelled and jig head hooks, spoon crank bait and plastic fishing lures, assorted sinker and line weights, vertical pole float, round bobber floats, line clipper, hook remover tool, fishing line and more.
PRODUCT DETAILS–  Product Dimensions: tackle box outside: 12.75 inches (L) x 7.00 inches (w) x 5.5 inches (H), tackle box Primary box depth: 4.25 inches, removable Tray depth: 1.25 inches.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED– Wakeman Outdoors is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product and ONLY tackle box kits by Wakeman Outdoors are GUARANTEED to be genuine
